content: easy colorwork beanie by you ve been yarned i used bernat satin for the main color of this hat but this color is no longer available the light gray is caron simply soft materials yarn worsted weight yarn in two colors needles 5mm 16 inch circular knitting needles and dpns notions/other mixed gray faux fur pom pom stitch marker tapestry needle scissors abbreviations co- cast on sts- stitches k-knit k2tog- knit two together pattern co 76 join in the round and place your stitch marker k a 2x2 ribbing until it measures approximately 1 5 inches increase 4 stitches evenly around for a total of 80 sts k 1 round begin working the chart once you ve completed the chart k two rounds in the main color begin decrease as follows k6 k2tog k k5 k2tog k k4 k2tog k k3 k2tog k k2 k2tog k k1 k2tog k2tog cut the yarn weave the tail through the live sts and cinch the hat closed weave in all ends and add your pom pom the pattern and images contained in this document are the property of you ve been yarned pattern is for personal use only do not redistribute or sell the pattern please give pattern credit to you ve been yarned when selling finished hats come say hi on instagram and tag me in a pic of your finished hat https //www instagram com/youvebeenyarned/ thank you
